void BM_editselection_center ( BMEditSelection *  ese,
float  r_center[3] 
)

Generic way to get data from an EditSelection type These functions were written to be used by the Modifier widget when in Rotate about active mode, but can be used anywhere.

  • #EM_editselection_center
  • #EM_editselection_normal
  • #EM_editselection_plane

void BM_mesh_select_mode_flush ( BMesh *  bm)

Select Mode Flush.

Makes sure to flush selections 'upwards' (ie: all verts of an edge selects the edge and so on). This should only be called by system and not tool authors.

Definition at line 74 of file bmesh_marking.c.

References BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, BM_elem_flag_disable, BM_elem_flag_enable, BM_elem_flag_set, BM_elem_flag_test, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN, BM_ELEM_SELECT, BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, BM_ITER_MESH, BM_select_history_validate(), BMLoop::e, FALSE, BMLoop::next, recount_totsels(), SCE_SELECT_EDGE, SCE_SELECT_VERTEX, BMesh::selectmode, TRUE, BMLoop::v, BMEdge::v1, and BMEdge::v2.
